sentences.en: 10,000 deaths a year from chronic lung disease are attributable to smoking.
sentences.cn: 吸烟导致每年有1万人死于慢性肺病。

sentences.en: Both drugs slow the progression of HIV, but neither cures the disease.
sentences.cn: 这两种药物都可以延缓艾滋病病情发展，但是都不能治愈这种疾病。

sentences.en: British forces in the Caribbean were being decimated by disease.
sentences.cn: 加勒比海地区的英国部队有大批的人病死。

sentences.en: Children in evacuation centres are falling prey to disease.
sentences.cn: 疏散中心的孩子正受到疾病的折磨。

sentences.en: Depression lowers the human ability to cope with disease.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症会降低人体对疾病的抵抗力。

sentences.en: He promised to appoint an AIDS czar to deal with the disease.
sentences.cn: 他许诺任命一位艾滋病大使来应对这种疾病。

sentences.en: His father died of heart disease.
No one knew how to treat this dreaded disease.
sentences.cn: 没人知道如何治疗这种可怕的疾病。

sentences.en: Receding gums can be the result of disease or simply incorrect brushing.
sentences.cn: 牙龈萎缩可能是疾病导致的，也可能仅仅是错误的刷牙方式引起的。

sentences.en: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.cn: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

sentences.en: The conditions are ripe for the spread of disease.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病传播的条件已经成熟。

sentences.en: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
sentences.cn: 该疾病一下子就使4,000万只兔子丧命。

sentences.en: The health authorities now know how to deal with the disease.
sentences.cn: 卫生部门现在知道如何对付这种病了。

sentences.en: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease.
sentences.cn: 针对公众对该疾病的不断蔓延日益担忧，从而出台了这一举措。

sentences.en: Were you surprised that his disease progressed so quickly?
sentences.cn: 他的病情发展得这么快，您是否感到意外？

sentences.en: When John was 17, he died of congenital heart disease.
sentences.cn: 约翰17岁时死于先天性心脏病。

sentences.en: When not removed, plaque causes tooth decay and gum disease.
sentences.cn: 牙斑如果不清除就会导致牙齿蛀蚀和牙龈疾病。

使生病；传染（disease的过去分词）
